God's Messenger Lydia:
Yes ... Corrupting Darkness .... It - the key to the knowledge of what is happening here. Better once to get a feel for myself, I will not detain you useless stories. But one more thing you should know. This is due to your security. Cursed Ancient Heroes will curse you. Their curses to change your appearance, you will become like themselves.
I call it Infected . This state has its pluses and minuses. On the one hand, it is dangerous to life, but on the other, gives great strength. Whatever it was, I hope this experience will help you get closer to the truth. Are you ready?
